QuestData.Title: Prized Repossessions
QuestData.Description: The Gordunni were given copies of my blades as a gift from the Iron Horde. But what do they use them for? Toothpicks!$b$bSure the blades are low grade copies but it's still MY design and I can't stand to think of them in those ogre hands for a moment longer!$b$b$gSir:Ma'am;, While we are in here can you do me a favor and get those blades out of their hands!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Gordunni "Toothpick's" from Gordunni Bashers or Gordunni Cleavers within Gordal Fortress.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, commander. With this another stain on my honor has been removed.
